original: Saṃsiddhidassanenāti saṃsiddhiyā niṭṭhānassa uparamassa dassanena.
analyzed: saṃsiddhi dassanena ati saṃsiddhiyāḥ niṭṭhānassa uparamassa dassanena

original: Idhāti imissā puggalapaññattipāḷiyā, imissā vā tadaṭṭhakathāya. Kilesapavattasīsānanti

original: itaravaṭṭānampi pariyādiyanaṃ. Vaṭṭupacchedakena maggeneva hi jīvitindriyampi anavasesato
analyzed: itara vaṭṭānam pi vaṭṭa upacchedakena maggena iva hi jīvitindriyam pi anavasesato

original: nirujjhatīti. Kasmā panettha pavattasīsaṃ visuṃ gahitanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “pavattasīsampī”tiādi.
analyzed: nirujjhati iti kasmā pana ittha pavatta sīsam visum gahitan iti codanam sandhāya āha pavatta sīsam pi itiādi

original: Odhiso ca anodhiso ca kilesapariyādāne sati sijjhamānā paccavekkhaṇavārā tena nipphādetabbāti

original: 17. Tiṭṭheyyāti na upagaccheyya. Ṭhānañhi gatinivatti. Tena vuttaṃ “nappavatteyyā”ti.

original: Tattha aggavijjāti āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇameva vā veditabbaṃ. Sā ca tevijjatāti yojanā.

original: 22. Tatthevāti saccābhisambodhe eva.

original: 24. Tanti nirodhasamāpattilābhino ubhatobhāgavimuttatāvacanaṃ. Vuttalakkhaṇūpapattikoti
analyzed: tat ti nirodha samāpatti lābhinaḥ ubhatobhāga vimutta tā vacanam vutta lakkhaṇa upapattikaḥ ti

original: Eseva nayoti yathā catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato nirodhato ca vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ

original: muccitabbaṃ, taṃ nissito hotīti vuttaṃ “nāmanissitako”ti. Tassāti kāyadvayavimuttiyā

original: 36. Parayoge tvā-saddo tadanto hutvā “parasaddayoge”ti vutto, appatvāti vuttaṃ hotīti “appattaṃ hutvā”ti iminā vuccati.

original: Suttantehīti devatāsaṃyuttādīhi. Liṅgākappabhedaṃ parato sayameva vakkhati.

analyzed: bhinditvā mūla saṅgahanti mūla saṅgītim bhedam vā katvā yathā sā ṭhitā

original: tato aññathā katvā. Saṅgahitato vā aññatrāti mūlasaṅgītiyā saṅgahitato aññatra. Tenāha

original: Saṅkantikānaṃ bhedo suttavādīti saṅkantikānaṃ anantare eko nikāyabhedo suttavādī nāma bhijjittha. Sahāti ekajjhaṃ katvā, gaṇiyamānāti attho.

original: 2. Pavattivāravaṇṇanā
27-164. Dukkhapariññā yāva dukkhasamatikkamanatthāti sappadesaṃ pavattāpi sā tadatthāvahā
analyzed: dukkha pariññā yāva dukkha samatikkamana atthā ati sa ppadesam pavattā api sā tad attha āvahā

original: upapannamevā”ti āha. Tattha tesveva keci dassīyantīti sambandho. Ekakoṭṭhāsuppattisamaṅginoti

original: sabbāni rūpāyatanāni, yattakāni tāni āpāthagatāni yogyadese ṭhitāni, tāni sabbānīti
analyzed: sabbāni rūpāyatanāni yattakāni tāni āpātha gatāni yogya dese ṭhitāni tāni sabbāni iti

original: attho. Saha na hontīti ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti. Satipi hi anekesaṃ ekajjhaṃ āpāthagamane
analyzed: attho saha na honti iti ekajjham ārammaṇam na honti sati api hi anekesam ekajjham āpāthagamane

original: yattha yattha pubbābhogo, taṃ taṃyeva ārammaṇaṃ hoti, na sabbaṃ. Nīlādisaṅghātavasena
analyzed: yattha yattha pubba ābhogo tam tam yeva ārammaṇam hoti na sabbam nīla ādi saṅghāta vasena

original: cetaṃ vuttaṃ, na paccekaṃ nīlādirūpāyatanamattavasena. Samuditāniyeva hi rūpāyatanāni
analyzed: ca itam vuttam na paccekam nīla ādi rūpāyatana matta vasena samuditāni iva hi rūpāyatanāni

original: cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ, na visuṃ visunti dhātuvibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ dassitoyaṃ nayo.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇassa ārammaṇam na visum visum ti dhātu vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā ayam dassitaḥ ayam nayo

original: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “te te visuṃ visuṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hontī”tipi vuttaṃ, tampi
analyzed: yam pana aṭṭhakathāyam te te visum visum ārammaṇa paccayaḥ honti iti pi vuttam tam pi

original: yathāvuttamevatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññathā rūpāyatanaṃ manindriyagocaraṃ nāma na
analyzed: yathā vuttam eva attham sandhāya vuttam aññathā rūpa āyatanam manindriya gocaram nāma na

original: siyā. Saddādīsupi eseva nayo. Tenevāha “tathā saddādayopī”ti. “Saha na hontī”ti vuttamatthaṃ
analyzed: siyā sadda ādīsu pi esā iva nayo tena iva āha tathā sadda ādayaḥ api iti saha na honti iti vuttam attham

original: pāḷiyā vibhāvetuṃ “yaṃ yanti hi vacanaṃ rūpādīni bhindatī”ti āha.
analyzed: yam yanti hi vacanam rūpa ādīni bhindati iti āha

original: “Ye ete”tiādiko purimo attho, “na ekato hontī”tiādiko pana pacchimo, “sabbārammaṇatādivasena
analyzed: ye ete iti ādikaḥ purimaḥ atthaḥ na ekatas honti iti ādikaḥ pana pacchimo sabba ārammaṇa tā ādi vasena

original: vā idhāpi attho gahetabbo”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi “yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā”ti imissā
analyzed: vā idha api atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ iti kasmā vuttam na hi yam yam vā pana ārabbha ati imissā

original: pāḷiyā viya “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti imassa pāṭhassa purato manoviññāṇassa sabbārammaṇatā
analyzed: pāḷiyā viya yam yam dhammam ārabbhāti imassa pāṭhassa puratas manaḥ viññāṇassa sabba ārammaṇa tā

original: nāgatā. Vuttañhi “sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ
analyzed: nāgatāḥ vuttaṃ hi sabbe dhammāḥ manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā tad sampayuttakānaṃ ca dhammānam

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti. Na hi anantarameva pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatamatthaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ti na hi anantaram eva pāḷiyam sarūpataḥ āgatam attham gahetvā

original: padantaraṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ. Tattha hi “rūpārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā niyamavasena cha ārammaṇāni
analyzed: padantaram saṃvaṇṇetabbam tattha hi rūpa ārammaṇam vāti ādinā niyama vasena cha ārammaṇāni

original: vatvā “yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā”ti vacanaṃ sabbārammaṇatādidassananti yuttamevetanti,
analyzed: vatvā yam yam vā pana ārabbha ati vacanam sabba ārammaṇa tā ādi dassanan ti yuttam eva etat ti

original: idha pana sabbārammaṇataṃ vatvā puna “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti vuccamānaṃ sabbārammaṇatādassananti
analyzed: idha pana sabba ārammaṇa tam vatvā puna yam yam dhammaṃ ārabbha ati vuccamānam sabba ārammaṇa tā dassanam ti

original: kathamidaṃ yujjeyya? Kamābhāvopi “sabbe dhammā”ti avisesavacaneneva siddho ārammaṇānupubbiyāva
analyzed: katham idam yujjeyya sabbe dhammā ti avisesa vacanena iva siddhaḥ ārammaṇa ānupubbiyā ava

original: aggahitattā. Na hi manodhātuyā viya manoviññāṇadhātuyā idha ārammaṇāni anupubbato
analyzed: aggahita ttā na hi manaḥ dhātuyā viya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā idha ārammaṇāni anupubbato

original: gahitāni, tattha viya vā eteneva niyamābhāvopi saṃvaṇṇitoti veditabbo. Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: gahitāni tattha viya vā etena iva niyama abhāvaḥ api saṃvaṇṇito ti veditabbo tasmai aṭṭhakathā ayam

original: vuttanayenevettha attho gahetabbo.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva ittha atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ

original: Pavattanti pavattanaṃ. Nadiyā sandanaṃ pabbatassa ṭhānanti hi vuttā aviratamavicchedanāyaṃ
analyzed: pavattanti pavattanam nadiyā sandanam pabbatassa ṭhānan ti hi vuttāḥ aviratam avicchedanāyam

original: tathāpavattikiriyāva. Tenāha “avirataṃ avicchinnaṃ sandantī”ti. Evanti yathā “sandantī”ti
analyzed: tena āha aviratam avicchinnam sandanti iti evanti yathā sandanti iti

original: vattamānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ “ye ye dhammā uppajjantī”ti sabbasaṅgahavasena uppajjanassa
analyzed: vattamāna vacanam vuttam evam ye ye dhammāḥ uppajjanti iti sabba saṅgaha vasena uppajjanassa

original: gahitattā ārammaṇapavaggato “uppajjantī”ti vattamānavacanaṃ vuttanti attho. Tenāha
analyzed: gahita ttā ārammaṇa pavaggataḥ uppajjanti iti vattamāna vacanam vuttanti atthaḥ tena āha

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbakālasaṅgahavasenā”tiādi. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “atītānāgata…pe… adhippāyo”ti,
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam sabba kāla saṅgaha vasena atiādi tathā ca vuttam adhippāyaḥ ti

original: atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānanti attho. Samudāyavasenāti cittena rāsīkaraṇavasena.
analyzed: atīta anāgata paccuppannānam citta cetasikānam ti attho samudāya vasena ati cittena rāsīkaraṇa vasena

original: Adhippāyoti iminā vattamānupacārena vināva “ye ye dhammā uppajjantī”ti ettha vattamānatthaṃ
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ ti iminā vattamāna upacārena vinā āva ye ye dhammāḥ uppajjanti iti ettha vattamāna ttham

original: sakkā yojetunti imamatthaṃ ulliṅgeti. Tenāha “ime panā”tiādi. Yadipi paccayadhammā
analyzed: sakkā yojetun ti imam attham ulliṅgeti tena āha ime pana atiādi yadi pi paccaya dhammā

original: keci atītā anāgatāpi honti, paccayuppannadhammo pana paccuppanno evāti āha “atītānāgatānaṃ
analyzed: keci atītāḥ anāgatāḥ api honti paccaya uppanna dhammo pana paccuppannaḥ eva ati āha atīta anāgatānam

original: na hontī”ti. Uppāde vā hi paccayuppannassa paccayena bhavitabbaṃ ṭhitiyaṃ vāti. Tasmāti
analyzed: na honti iti uppāde vā hi paccaya uppannassa paccayena bhavitabbam ṭhitiyam vā ati tasmā iti

original: yasmā atītānāgatā paramatthato natthi, tasmā. Tesūti paccayuppannesu. Taṃtaṃpaccayāti
analyzed: yasmai atīta anāgatā paramatthataḥ natthi tasmai tesu iti paccaya uppannesu taṃ taṃ paccayā ati

original: taṃ taṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ paccayo etesanti taṃtaṃpaccayā. Ayamattho dassito hoti samānasabhāvattā.
analyzed: tam tam rūpa ādi ārammaṇam paccayaḥ etesan ti taṃ taṃ paccayā ayam atthaḥ dassitaḥ hoti samāna sabhāva ttā

original: Na hi atthābhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi. Na pana taṃtaṃpaccayavantatā dassitā hoti
analyzed: na hi attha abhedena sa bhāva bhedaḥ atthi na pana taṃ taṃ paccayavanta tā dassitā hoti

original: atītānāgatesu nippariyāyena tadabhāvato. Yasmā paccayavanto paccayuppannāyeva, te
analyzed: atīta anāgatesu nippariyāyena tad abhāvataḥ yasmā paccayavantaḥ paccaya uppannāya iva te

original: ca paccuppannāyevāti.
analyzed: ca paccuppannāya iva ati

original: Yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ te te dhammāti yaṃnimittāyaṃvacanabhedo, taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi
analyzed: yam yam dhammam te te dhammā ati yaṃ nimitta ayaṃvacana bhedaḥ tam dassetum ettha ca atiādi

original: āraddhaṃ. Rūpārūpadhammā hi kalāpato pavattamānāpi cittacetasikānaṃ kadāci visuṃ
analyzed: āraddham rūpa arūpa dhammā hi kalāpataḥ pavattamānā api citta cetasikānam kadāci visum

original: visuṃ ārammaṇaṃ honti, kadāci ekajjhaṃ, na ettha niyamo atthi, purimābhogoyeva pana
analyzed: visum ārammaṇam honti kadāci ekajjham na ettha niyamaḥ atthi pana

original: tathāgahaṇe kāraṇaṃ. Tayimaṃ dīpetuṃ bhagavatā yaṃvacanabhedo katoti ca sakkā vattuṃ,
analyzed: kāraṇam tayā imam dīpetum bhagavatā yaṃvacana bhedaḥ kataḥ iti ca sakkā vattum

original: yasmā pana ekakalāpapariyāpannānampi dhammānaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇe na samudāyo gayhati
analyzed: yasmā pana eka kalāpa pariyāpannānam pi dhammānam ekajjham gahaṇe na samudāyaḥ gayhati

original: tadābhogābhāvato, atha kho samuditā dhammā evāti sahaggahaṇampi visuṃgahaṇagatikaṃ,
analyzed: tad ābhoga abhāvataḥ atha kho samuditāḥ dhammāḥ eva ati saha gahaṇam pi visuṃgahaṇa gatikam

original: tasmā visuṃgahaṇasabbhāvadīpanatthaṃ “yaṃ ya”nti vatvā satipi visuṃgahaṇe te sabbe
analyzed: tasmā visuṃgahaṇa sabbhāva dīpana attham yam yanti vatvā sati pi visuṃgahaṇe te sabbe

original: ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hontīti dassanatthaṃ “te te”ti vuttanti imamatthaṃ dassento
analyzed: ekajjham ārammaṇa paccayaḥ honti iti dassana attham te te ti vuttan ti imam attham dassento

original: “cattāro hi khandhā”tiādimāha. Tattha vedanādīsūti vedanādīsu catūsu khandhesu abhinditvā
analyzed: cattāro hi khandhā tiādim āha tattha vedanā ādīsu iti vedanā ādīsu catūsu khandhesu a bhinditvā

original: gahaṇavasena, bhinditvā pana gahaṇavasena phassādīsu. Yo ca rūpādikoti idaṃ viññāṇantarassa
analyzed: gahaṇa vasena bhinditvā pana gahaṇa vasena phassa ādīsu yo ca rūpa ādiko ti idam viññāṇa antarassa

original: sādhāraṇārammaṇavasena vuttaṃ, ye ca aneke phassādayoti idaṃ asādhāraṇārammaṇavasena.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa ārammaṇa vasena vuttam ye ca aneke phassa ādayaḥ ti idam asādhāraṇa ārammaṇa vasena

original: Te sabbeti te sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇappabhede sabbepi ārammaṇadhamme. Ekekameva ārabbha
analyzed: te sabbe iti te sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa ppabhede sabbe api ārammaṇa dhamme ekekam eva ārabbha

original: uppajjantīti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Rūpārammaṇadhammā ca aneke
analyzed: uppajjanti iti ettha yam vattabbam tat heṭṭhā vuttam eva rūpa ārammaṇa dhammā ca aneke

original: nīlādibhedato. Tathāti aneke. Tena bherisaddādike, mūlagandhādike, mūlarasādike,
analyzed: nīla ādi bhedataḥ tathā ati aneke tena bheri sadda ādike mūla gandha ādike mūla rasa ādike

original: kathinasamphassādike, vedanādike ca saṅgaṇhāti. Aneketi hi iminā anekakalāpagatānaṃyeva
analyzed: vedanā ādike ca saṅgaṇhāti aneka iti hi iminā

original: vaṇṇādīnaṃ indriyaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvamāha. Sāmaññato hi vuttaṃ yathārahaṃ bhinditvā
analyzed: vaṇṇa ādīnam indriya viññāṇa ārammaṇa bhāvam āha sāmaññataḥ hi vuttam yathāraham bhinditvā

original: nidassitabbaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: nidassitabbam hoti iti

original: Kusalavipākassāti kusalassa vipākassa ca. Na hi nibbānaṃ pubbe nivutthanti idaṃ “diṭṭhanibbānoyevā”tiādinā
analyzed: kusala vipākassa ati kusalassa vipākassa ca na hi nibbānam pubbe nivutthanti idam

original: vakkhamānameva atthaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ. Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena hi nibbānavibhāvanaṃ
analyzed: vakkhamānam eva attham hadaye ṭhapetvā vuttam pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇena hi nibbāna vibhāvanam

original: adiṭṭhasaccassa vā siyā diṭṭhasaccassapi vā. Tattha adiṭṭhasaccena tāva taṃ vibhāvetumeva
analyzed: a diṭṭha saccassa vā siyā diṭṭha saccassa api vā tattha a diṭṭha saccena tāva tam vibhāvetum eva

original: na sakkā appaṭividdhattā, itarassa pana pageva vibhūtamevāti taṃ tena vibhāvitaṃ
analyzed: na sakkā appaṭividdha ttā itarassa pana pagā iva vibhūtam eva ati tam tena vibhāvitam

original: nāma hotīti adhippāyo. Ettha ca “na ca taṃ vutta”nti iminā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
analyzed: nāma hoti iti adhippāyaḥ ettha ca na ca tat vuttan ti iminā pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇassa

original: nibbānārammaṇakaraṇābhāvaṃ āgamato dassetvā “na hi nibbāna”ntiādinā yuttito dasseti.
analyzed: nibbāna ārammaṇa karaṇa abhāvam āgamataḥ dassetvā na hi nibbāna nti ādinā yuttitaḥ dasseti

original: Tattha “na pubbe nivutthaṃ asaṅkhatattā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Gocarāsevanāya āsevitassapi
analyzed: tattha na pubbe nivuttham asaṅkhata ttā ti kasmā vuttam gocara āsevanāya āsevitassa api

original: nivutthanti icchitattā. Diṭṭhasaccoyeva hi pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena nibbānaṃ vibhāveti,
analyzed: nivuttham ti icchita ttā diṭṭhasacca uyā iva hi pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇena nibbānam vibhāveti

original: na adiṭṭhasacco. Taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ khandhe viya khandhapaṭibaddhepi vibhāvetīti nibbānārammaṇakhandhavibhāvane
analyzed: na adiṭṭhasaccaḥ tam pana ñāṇam khandhe viya khandha paṭibaddhe pi vibhāveti iti nibbāna ārammaṇa khandha vibhāvane

original: nibbānampi vibhāvetīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Etena payojanābhāvacodanā paṭikkhittāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: nibbānam pi vibhāveti iti sakkā viññātum etena payojana abhāva codanā paṭikkhittā iti daṭṭhabbā

original: Evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇepi yojetabbanti yathā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa nibbānārammaṇatā
analyzed: evam anāgataṃsa ñāṇe api yojetabbanti yathā pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇassa nibbāna ārammaṇa tā

original: dassitā, evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇepi yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tattha pana “khandhapaṭibaddhavibhāvanakāle”tiādinā
analyzed: dassitāḥ evam anāgataṃsañāṇe pi yathāraham yojetabbam tattha pana khandha paṭibaddha vibhāvana kāla iti ādinā

original: yojanā veditabbā. Tena vuttaṃ “yathāraha”nti. Kassaci abhiññāppattassapi rūpāvacarassa, pageva itarassa.
analyzed: yojanā veditabbā tena vuttam yathārahanti kassaci abhiññā appattassa api rūpāvacarassa pagā iva itarassa

original: Ārammaṇapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 3. Adhipatipaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: adhipati paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 3. Dhurasahacariyato dhoreyyo “dhura”nti vuttoti āha “dhuranti dhuraggāha”nti. Chandassa
analyzed: dhura sahacariyataḥ dhoreyyaḥ dhuranti vutto ti āha dhuranti chandassa

original: pubbaṅgamatāsiddhaṃ pāsaṃsabhāvaṃ upādāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jeṭṭhaka”nti vuttanti tamevatthaṃ
analyzed: pubbaṅgama tā siddham pāsaṃsa bhāvam upādāya aṭṭhakathā ayam jeṭṭhakanti vuttan ti tam eva attham

original: dīpento “seṭṭha”nti āha. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā
analyzed: dīpentaḥ seṭṭham ti āha tathā hi vuttam aṭṭhasāliniyam chandam pubbaṅgamam katvā

original: āyūhita”nti. Purimachandassāti “chandādhipatī”ti purimasmiṃ pade niddesavasena vuttassa
analyzed: āyūhitam ti purima chandassa ati chanda adhipati iti purimasmin pade niddesa vasena vuttassa

original: chandasaddassa samānarūpena sadisākārena. Tadanantaraṃ niddiṭṭhenāti tassa purimassa
analyzed: chanda saddassa samāna rūpena sadisa ākārena tad anantaram niddiṭṭhena ati tassa purimassa

original: chandasaddassa anantaraṃ niddesavasena vuttena. Tato eva ca taṃsamānatthatāya ca
analyzed: anantaram niddesa vasena vuttena tatas eva ca tad samāna ttha tāya ca

original: taṃsambandhena “chandasampayuttakāna”nti ettha chandasaddeneva adhipatisaddarahitenāti
analyzed: tad sambandhena chanda sampayuttakānam ti ettha chanda saddena iva adhipati sadda rahitena ati

original: attho. Paccayabhūtassāti adhipatipaccayabhūtassa. Sampayuttakavisesanabhāvoti attanā
analyzed: atthaḥ paccaya bhūtassa ati adhipati paccaya bhūtassa sampayuttaka visesana bhāvaḥ ti attanā

original: sampayuttadhammānaṃ so eva adhipatipaccayatāsaṅkhāto visesanabhāvo. Esa nayoti iminā
analyzed: sampayutta dhammānam saḥ eva adhipati paccaya tā saṅkhātaḥ visesana bhāvaḥ esa nayo ti iminā

original: “vīriyādhipati vīriyasampayuttakānantiādīsu purimavīriyassa samānarūpenā”tiādinā
analyzed: vīriya adhipati vīriya sampayuttakānaṃ ti ādīsu purima vīriyassa samāna rūpena ati ādinā

original: vattabbaṃ atthavacanaṃ atidisati.
analyzed: vattabbam attha vacanam atidisati

original: Kusalābyākatānaṃ pavattinti kusalābyākatānaṃ adhipatīnaṃ pavattanākāraṃ. Aladdhaṃ
analyzed: kusala abyākatānam pavattim ti kusala abyākatānam adhipatīnam pavattana ākāram a laddham

original: ārammaṇaṃ laddhabbaṃ labbhanīyaṃ, laddhuṃ vā sakkuṇeyyaṃ, dutiye pana atthe lābhamarahatīti
analyzed: ārammaṇam laddhabbam labbhanīyam laddhum vā sakkuṇeyyam dutiye pana atthe lābham arahati iti

original: laddhabbaṃ. Avaññātanti pageva anavaññātanti attho.
analyzed: laddhabbam avaññātanti pagā iva an avaññātanti attho

original: Appanāppattā kusalakiriyadhammā mahābalā sādhipatikā eva honti, tathā micchattaniyatāpīti
analyzed: appanā appattā kusala kiriya dhammā mahā balā sa adhipatikāḥ eva honti tathā micchatta niyatā api iti

original: āha “appanāsadisā…pe… nuppajjantī”ti. Appanāsadisāti appanāppattasadisā. Kammakilesāvaraṇabhūtā
analyzed: āha appanā sadisā ape nuppajjanti iti appanā sadisā ati appanā appatta sadisā kamma kilesa āvaraṇa bhūtā

original: ca teti te micchattaniyatadhammā kammāvaraṇabhūtā, ye ānantariyappakārā kilesāvaraṇabhūtā,
analyzed: ca te iti te micchatta niyata dhammā kamma āvaraṇa bhūtā ye ānantariya ppakārā kilesa āvaraṇa bhūtā

original: Adhipatipaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 4. Anantarapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā

original: nirantaruppādanasamatthatā ca cittaniyamahetuviseso daṭṭhabbo. Dhātuvasenāti viññāṇadhātumanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātuvasena.
analyzed: nirantara uppādana samattha tā ca citta niyama hetu visesaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ dhātu vasena ati viññāṇa dhātu manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu vasena

original: Ettakā eva hi dhātuyo bhinnasabhāvā anantarapaccayatāya niyametvā vattabbā, abhinnasabhāvā

original: pana visesābhāvato purimatāmattaṃyeva visesaṃ purakkhatvā vattabbāti tā kusalādibhedena

original: tathā vuttā. Tenāha “kusalādivasena cā”ti. Yā pana manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātuvasena

original: anantarapaccayatā vattabbā, tattha manoviññāṇadhātu manodhātuyā anantarapaccayena

original: paccayoti vuccamāno sammoho siyā, pure manodhātuyā anantarapaccayabhāvena vuttā,

original: “manodhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyāti cā”ti. Tathevāti niyamābhāvato evāti attho. Tasmāti

original: niyamābhāvo cāti ime dosā āpajjanti, tasmā. Nidassanenāti dhātuvasena nidassanena.
analyzed: niyama abhāvaḥ ca ati ime dosāḥ āpajjanti tasmā nidassanena ati dhātu vasena nidassanena

original: Nayaṃ dassetvāti “manoviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca

analyzed: dassetvā niravasesa dassana ttham ti niravasesassa anantara paccaya bhāvino cittuppādassa dassana attham

original: Sadisakusalānanti samānakusalānaṃ, samānatā cettha ekavīthipariyāpannatāya veditabbā.

original: Tenevāha “bhūmibhinnānampi paccayabhāvo vutto hotī”ti. Samānavīthitā ca yasmā samānavedanā

original: Tena padadvayena samānesu paccayapaccayuppannadhammesu purimato pacchimassa visesamatthaṃ dasseti.

original: bhummekavacanābhidheyyo, tadubhayaṃ sati kālavantakālatāvibhāge kiṃ-saddassa vacanīyatāsāmaññena

original: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kismiñcī”ti bhummavaseneva vuttaṃ. Tena yathāvuttaatthavibhāgena

original: padena. Vatthubhūtāti vatthusabhāvā. Hadayarūpameva sandhāya vadati. Rūpantarānanti

original: Atthavivaraṇañhi paccayaniddesapāḷiyā sabbepi satta mahāvārā. Vatthussa vattabbatte

original: etena vacanena. Kevalassāti nāmarahitassa vatthussa. Tathāti nāmassa paccayabhāvena.

original: Sahajātapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 8. Nissayapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā

original: sahajātena na vinā purejātaatthipaccayoti attho. Itaresu pana atthipaccayadhammesu

original: niyamo natthi tehi sahāpi vināpi bhāvato. Tenāha “na itarehī”ti. Tampi vatthu taṃsahitapurejātamevāti

original: taṃsahitārammaṇapurejātameva ca, na kevalaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaṃ. Tenāha “na itara”nti.
